channel.title: Kaiyang Zhou's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Kaiyang Zhou's Homepage

item.description: Profile Bio Dr. Kaiyang Zhou is currently a postdoctoral researcher at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, working with Prof. Ziwei Liu and Prof. Chen Change Loy. He obtained his PhD in Computer Science (2020) from the University of Surrey, UK, under the supervision of Prof. Tao Xiang. Prior to that, he received his MSc with Distinction (2016) from the University of Bristol, UK; BSc with 1st class honor (2015) from Ulster University, UK; BEng (2015) from Fujian Normal University, China.

Publications Please visit my Google Scholar page for an up-to-date list of papers. 2022 Learning to Prompt for Vision-Language Models Kaiyang Zhou, Jingkang Yang, Chen Change Loy, Ziwei Liu International Journal of Computer Vision (IJCV), 2022 arxiv | code Panoptic Scene Graph Generation Jingkang Yang, Yi Zhe Ang, Zujin Guo, Kaiyang Zhou, Wayne Zhang, Ziwei Liu European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV), 2022 arxiv (coming soon) Open-Vocabulary DETR with Conditional Matching

Teaching Nanyang Technological University Lecturer / Guest Lecturer “Open-World Visual Recognition” for AI6126: Advanced Computer Vision (1 Apr 2022) “Object Detection” in the OpenMMLab Workshop (28-30 June 2021) Queen Mary University of London Teaching Assistant ECS797: Machine Learning for Visual Data Analytics (Spring 2018) ECS708: Machine Learning (Fall 2017, Fall 2018)
